articles.title: Overwatch League Summer Showdown semifinals delayed, schedule swapped - Dot Esports
articles.description: The Toronto Defiant and Philadelphia Fusion will now play first at 3pm CT.
articles.content:
The Overwatch League Summer Showdown semifinals have been delayed and reorganized due to an unknown circumstance, throwing a wrench into an already hectic weekend.
